replyContent:
I am sorry that you feel this way, but this is definitely not a scam. You can still use the app with internal storage. Plus, if you update to latest version of the F-Stop, we have a workaround which works for most of the devices. 

Google removed write permissions in KitKat for external storage, and this is something that is out of our control.
